title: 35 Best Advent Calendars for the 2024 Christmas Season
description: The wait is over: 2024 Advent calendars are officially here. We dug deep into the latest and greatest arrivals and rounded up our editors' favorites. You'll want to get your order in soon, as a lot of these Advent calendars sell out quickly.
author: Desiree DeNunzio
excerpt: The wait is over: 2024 Advent calendars are officially here. We dug deep into the latest and greatest arrivals and rounded up our editors' favorites. You'll want to get your order in soon, as a lot of these Advent calendars sell out quickly.
text: The wait is over: 2024 Advent calendars are officially here. We dug deep into the latest and greatest arrivals and rounded up our editors' favorites. You'll want to get your order in soon, as a lot of these Advent calendars sell out quickly. Desiree DeNunzio is the gift guide editor for CNET's Commerce team. When she's not writing and editing, she's either hiking through the redwoods or curled up with a good book and a lazy dog. Expertise Desiree has been a writer and editor for the past two decades, covering everything from top-selling Amazon deals to apparel, pets and home goods. CredentialsDesiree's previous work has appeared in various print and online publications including Search Engine Land, PCWorld, Wired magazine and PBS MediaShift. Natalia Lusinski Contributor Natalia is a contributing writer for CNET. Her work can also be seen in places like Business Insider, Yahoo and Forbes. She spent several years living abroad, from goat-sitting in the Swiss Alps to staying with nuns at a monastery in Venice. Back in Los Angeles, she runs a popular pizza Meetup and is still on a quest to find her favorite slice. Our expert, award-winning staff selects the products we cover and rigorously researches and tests our top picks. If you buy through our links, we may get a commission. Reviews ethics statementBest Advent calendars overall Bonne Maman's 2024 Advent Calendar Bonne Maman's Advent calendar is always popular -- and that's not a surprise. Who doesn't love jam? The Limited Edition 2024 version features 24 different festive flavors, including Apricot with Orange Blossom and Caramel with Coffee, which makes for a sweet Christmas countdown.   12 Days of Hot Sauce If you or a loved one is crazy about hot sauce, this Advent calendar is sure to delight. There are 12 1.75-ounce bottles to challenge anyone who likes to spice things up. Spicy gourmet flavors include Habanero Evil, Zombie Apocalypse, Pineapple Papaya BBQ, Psycho Curry and more. This Advent calendar is bound to be a foodie favorite. Flaviar's Whiskey Advent Calendar Count down to Christmas with Flaviar's much sought-after whiskey Advent calendar. This year's theme is Hotel Flaviar. The set includes two collectible Glencairn tasting glasses, a tasting booklet and, most importantly, 24 vials of premium whiskey, 50mL each, from award winners to new releases. The gift recipient will also receive a "hotel keycard" -- a free one-year Flaviar Black Membership. You can preorder the calendar now for $250, and orders are guaranteed to arrive by the end of November. Himalayan Dog Chew Best Friend's Dog Advent Calendar Why should humans have all the fun during the holidays? Treat your pooch to 24 days of cheesy, meaty treats. It's a great way to include your four-legged friend in the holiday excitement, or you can gift it to a fellow dog owner.  The Beatles Collector’s 24-Pack Advent Calendar Socks Gift Set, Special Edition We all know someone who perpetually loses socks (maybe it's even us). But you won't want to lose any of these iconic Beatles ones. For 24 days, you'll open a new square of this limited edition Advent calendar from Happy Socks. And with these, "happy" is an understatement. Dandelion Chocolate 2024 Advent Calendar Our editors are big fans of San Francisco-based chocolatier Dandelion Chocolate, which crafts small batches of premium, single-origin chocolate. Everything we've tried from Dandelion, from chocolate bars to their baking chips (designed by a Tesla industrial designer no less) is mouth-watering perfection. It's little surprise that their stunning Advent calendar sells out every year. Get yours while you can. Voluspa 12-Day Candle Advent Calendar Make the Advent season bright -- literally -- with Voluspa's coveted candles from their signature Japonica Collection. Tucked behind the 12 doors of its 2024 Advent calendar are some of the brand's top fragrances, including Santal Vanille, Forbidden Fig and Baltic Amber. Seasonal scents Spiced Pumpkin Latte and White Cypress add a special touch to the holiday season. (We won't spoil the surprise of the other seven fragrances!) Each 2.5-ounce vegan candle is hand-poured and can burn for approximately 25 hours, and the set comes with a wick trimmer, which will help the candles last longer. Fly By Jing Winter in Sichuan Advent Calendar CNET kitchen guru David Watsky calls Fly By Jing's Sichuan chili crisp the "condiment to obsess over." This popular Advent calendar includes 12 2-ounce jars of spicy, flavorful goodness, including some you've probably never tried. Best candy Advent calendars Sugarfina’s 24 Tastes of Christmas Candy Advent Calendar For a little daily dose of sugar, this Advent calendar will satisfy your sweet tooth. Each drawer contains a few pieces of delicious candy from the renowned Sugarfina brand, including Peppermint Bark Cookies, Red Apple Gummies, Holiday Hearts and Sparkling Stars. Williams Sonoma Peppermint Bark Advent Calendar If you haven't tried Williams Sonoma's peppermint bark, let us just warn you that it's highly, highly addictive. Luckily, with this festive Advent calendar, you can savor a sweet treat each day instead of gobbling a whole box down (which has been known to happen). You'll get 24 mini treats in various shapes, like trees, Santas, toy soldiers and snowmen -- all made from the most delectable peppermint bark on the planet. See's Candies 2024 Advent Calendar When it comes to chocolate and other sugary confections, See's is a classic. Any chocolate lover will love this Advent calendar, which has 24 pull-out drawers, each featuring a premium See's candy, such as a truffle or Lollypop -- plus, a never-before-seen treat. It comes as no surprise that its Advent calendar is quick to sell out each year. Luckily, you can preorder it, with orders available to ship as early as Oct. 18. Dylan's Candy Bar Oh Christmas Tree New York's Dylan's Candy Bar has a 2024 Advent calendar that's surprisingly budget-friendly. For just $10, you get a daily sweet treat from the iconic candy purveyor, including gummies, candy canes and a Snowman lollypop. Best food and beverage Advent calendars Harry & David Limited Edition 24 Days of Treats Advent Calendar From chocolate peppermint truffles to vanilla shortbread cookies, this Advent calendar is filled with 24 drawers of delectable treats. Not only does the wooden Advent calendar make a nice keepsake once the holiday season ends, but it also lights up (batteries not included), with Saint Nick and his reindeer flying through a moonlit sky. Personalized Coffee Pod Advent Christmas Tree This coffee pod Advent calendar will not only satisfy any coffee fiend's daily caffeine fix, but also makes for a nice and unique gift, as the star on top can come engraved. For 40 characters or less, you can personalize the tree and have it say something like "Kim's Christmas Countdown." The tree is handmade from natural birch wood, is about 23" tall and will spruce up any kitchen or work break room. Hickory Farms’ 12 Days of Charcuterie Advent Calendar Calling all charcuterie fans: This Advent calendar is tantalizing for the taste buds. It includes flavorsome products like Sweet & Smoky Turkey Summer Sausage, Jalapeño Cheddar Blend and Strawberry Fig Jam -- as well as some chocolate surprises, too. Walker’s 2024 Advent Calendar with Shortbread Cookies Shortbread cookies are a fun variation on the typical chocolate Advent calendar -- and this one would pair well with a tea Advent calendar, but is also delicious on its own. It has six varieties of cookies, from stars and hearts to salted caramel squares and Walker's well-known shortbread fingers. 24 Days of Tea Advent Calendar Start your day off right with a different tea each morning. Palais des Thés' tea Advent calendar includes 24 different gourmet tea bags filled with all sorts of delectable varieties, including black teas, green teas, herbal teas and Rooibos. It's a fantastic gift for the tea lover in your life and can also help take some of the stress out of the holidays. Williams Sonoma Christmas Popcorn Advent Calendar What better way to count down the days than to watch your favorite holiday movies with a bowl of popcorn each night? Pop open the doors -- no pun intended -- and discover a variety of premium popping corn and seasonings, including zesty cheddar, sweet caramel, dill pickle and other fun flavors. This is the perfect Advent calendar for someone who loves to indulge but doesn't want candy, because who doesn't love snacks? Man Crates Beef Jerky Advent Calendar We all know someone who can't get enough beef jerky and this Advent calendar will make all their carnivorous dreams come true. Over the course of 25 days, they'll get to try flavors like Sesame Ginger, Orange Habanero and even Rootbeer. Best boozy Advent calendars Nipyata Boozy Advent Calendar: 12 Shots of Christmas If you can't decide what kind of alcohol-based Advent calendar to get someone -- or yourself -- you can get this variety pack, which contains 12 50mL favorites like Kahlua Coffee Liqueur, Baileys Irish Cream and Johnie Walker Black. We'll toast to that! Wine Advent Calendar In Good Taste's popular wine Advent calendars sell out quickly each year, and they're back for the 2024 holiday season. This Red, White & Rosé Advent calendar comes with 24 mini bottles, each holding 187mL of premium wine -- including Sauvignon Blanc, a fruity Grenache and a Shiraz -- from wine regions like California, Argentina, Italy -- and more. This calendar makes a festive hostess or office party gift for a wine lover, but we think it's also great to savor solo. Woodford Reserve 8 Day Cocktail Advent Calendar Bourbon lovers -- or anyone in your home who enjoys a good cocktail -- will appreciate this 8 Days of Spirit calendar from Kentucky distiller Woodford Reserve. While it doesn't come with bottles of bourbon per se, you'll get a bevy of bitters and mixers to make a satisfying cocktail each evening. 12 Days of IPAs Advent Calendar 2024 If there's an IPA lover in your life, this Advent calendar won't disappoint. Add some cheer to the holidays with this tasty selection from highly-rated U.S. craft breweries to help you count down the days to Christmas. Preorder it now for delivery in November. Best beauty Advent calendars Lush Advent Calendar If you or someone you know is into bath bombs and shower gels, this Lush Advent calendar is full of them -- as well as other fun self-care-type items, like Yog Nog Body Lotion, Magic of Christmas Perfume and a calming Hot Toddy Scented Candle. And another perk? You can reuse the artsy box once you open all the Advent surprises inside. L’Occitane 24-Piece Classic Advent Calendar If you've ever wanted to try various luxury L'Occitane products, this Advent calendar is perfect for doing so. It features travel-sized samples, like Shea Butter Hand Cream and Verbena Shower Gel. (There is also a Premium Advent Calendar, which includes some full-sized products for $140.) Benefit Cosmetics 'The Gorgeous Grocer' Beauty Advent Calendar Sparkle at all your holiday parties with this kit full of beauty products that are sure to keep you feeling ultra-glamorous. You'll get 24 days of surprises, from volumizing mascara and foaming cleanser to various shades of blush and lip tints. And the best news is each beauty surprise will last far past Advent. Olive & June 25 Days of Mani Magic If you want to pamper yourself or a loved one this holiday season, Olive & June is the ultimate at-home mani experience. This year's "25 Days of Mani Magic" features six mini polishes in festive colors -- like Blitzen and Tangled Lights -- as well as mani must-haves, like nail files, a nail art pen and nail art stickers, among manicure accessories. In addition to the 25 Days calendar, Olive & June also sells a Hanukkah calendar ($55). Best Advent calendars for kids Lego Star Wars Advent Calendar 2024 This is fun for all ages. Every year, I get the latest edition for friends' kids and it's always a hit -- and their parents love putting the creations together just as much. The Advent calendar includes six miniature Star Wars figures -- like holiday versions of Princess Leia and Luke Skywalker -- as well as 18 buildable toys, including favorites like the Millennium Falcon, Yoda's Jedi Starfighter and Darth Vader's Castle. Elf Advent Calendar Anyone who loves the movie Elf (and who doesn't?) will be totally enamored with this Advent calendar from Williams Sonoma. It comes with a Mr. Narwhal sugar cookie, cocoa mix, a chocolate penguin and snowman and the kicker: maple syrup. Mattel Barbie Advent Calendar Barbie is still a fan favorite among kids and adults alike. This Advent calendar is like playing dress-up -- it comes with a Barbie doll and 24 accessories. Each day, a new one is revealed for her to wear, whether it's a jacket, purse, pair of high heels, you name it. Light-Up Wooden Train Advent Calendar A lot of kids love trains, and this Advent train calendar, the Anthro Express, is sure to be a hit among them. Although the train car doors open, you will have to fill them with your child's favorite things. The twinkling LED lights add a magical holiday feel, too. Build-a-Bear Merry Mission Advent Calendar This Build-a-Bear Advent calendar is inspired by the "Glisten and the Merry Mission" movie and includes 25 windows to open. Inside, you'll find a total of six mini stuffed animals, as well as 19 various clothing and accessory items to dress them up. And unlike a candy Advent calendar, the fun surprises will last long after Christmas. Harry Potter Lego Advent Calendar Harry Potter movies and Legos are fun for all ages, and this Advent calendar is a perfect combination of both. Each year, Lego creates a new buildable Hogwarts adventure. This year's kit includes seven Harry Potter characters -- favorites like Harry himself and Professor Flitwick -- as well as festive accessories, like a Christmas tree with a mini Hogwarts Express Train. Funko Pop Disney Advent Calendar Anyone who's a firm believer that Disneyland is the happiest place on Earth will appreciate this Disney Advent calendar from Funko. The collectible brand has created 24 vinyl figurines of all your favorite Disney characters -- but with a holiday twist. It's a lot of fun finding out which character you'll get each day, and you can use them as holiday decorations around your home, too. Play-Doh Advent Calendar This is a creative DIY Play-Doh kit. Each day, a new mini can of Play-Doh is revealed, along with an accessory, like a star or Christmas tree cutout. Great for ages 3 and older. html:
The wait is over: 2024 Advent calendars are officially here. We dug deep into the latest and greatest arrivals and rounded up our editors' favorites. You'll want to get your order in soon, as a lot of these Advent calendars sell out quickly.

Desiree DeNunzio is the gift guide editor for CNET's Commerce team. When she's not writing and editing, she's either hiking through the redwoods or curled up with a good book and a lazy dog.

Expertise Desiree has been a writer and editor for the past two decades, covering everything from top-selling Amazon deals to apparel, pets and home goods. Credentials

  • Desiree's previous work has appeared in various print and online publications including Search Engine Land, PCWorld, Wired magazine and PBS MediaShift.

Natalia Lusinski Contributor

Natalia is a contributing writer for CNET. Her work can also be seen in places like Business Insider, Yahoo and Forbes. She spent several years living abroad, from goat-sitting in the Swiss Alps to staying with nuns at a monastery in Venice. Back in Los Angeles, she runs a popular pizza Meetup and is still on a quest to find her favorite slice.

Our expert, award-winning staff selects the products we cover and rigorously researches and tests our top picks. If you buy through our links, we may get a commission. Reviews ethics statement

Best Advent calendars overall

Bonne Maman's 2024 Advent Calendar

Bonne Maman's Advent calendar is always popular -- and that's not a surprise. Who doesn't love jam? The Limited Edition 2024 version features 24 different festive flavors, including Apricot with Orange Blossom and Caramel with Coffee, which makes for a sweet Christmas countdown.  

12 Days of Hot Sauce

If you or a loved one is crazy about hot sauce, this Advent calendar is sure to delight. There are 12 1.75-ounce bottles to challenge anyone who likes to spice things up. Spicy gourmet flavors include Habanero Evil, Zombie Apocalypse, Pineapple Papaya BBQ, Psycho Curry and more. This Advent calendar is bound to be a foodie favorite.

Flaviar's Whiskey Advent Calendar

Count down to Christmas with Flaviar's much sought-after whiskey Advent calendar. This year's theme is Hotel Flaviar. The set includes two collectible Glencairn tasting glasses, a tasting booklet and, most importantly, 24 vials of premium whiskey, 50mL each, from award winners to new releases. The gift recipient will also receive a "hotel keycard" -- a free one-year Flaviar Black Membership. You can preorder the calendar now for $250, and orders are guaranteed to arrive by the end of November.

Himalayan Dog Chew Best Friend's Dog Advent Calendar

Why should humans have all the fun during the holidays? Treat your pooch to 24 days of cheesy, meaty treats. It's a great way to include your four-legged friend in the holiday excitement, or you can gift it to a fellow dog owner. 

The Beatles Collector’s 24-Pack Advent Calendar Socks Gift Set, Special Edition

We all know someone who perpetually loses socks (maybe it's even us). But you won't want to lose any of these iconic Beatles ones. For 24 days, you'll open a new square of this limited edition Advent calendar from Happy Socks. And with these, "happy" is an understatement.

Dandelion Chocolate 2024 Advent Calendar

Our editors are big fans of San Francisco-based chocolatier Dandelion Chocolate, which crafts small batches of premium, single-origin chocolate.

Everything we've tried from Dandelion, from chocolate bars to their baking chips (designed by a Tesla industrial designer no less) is mouth-watering perfection. It's little surprise that their stunning Advent calendar sells out every year. Get yours while you can.

Voluspa 12-Day Candle Advent Calendar

Make the Advent season bright -- literally -- with Voluspa's coveted candles from their signature Japonica Collection. Tucked behind the 12 doors of its 2024 Advent calendar are some of the brand's top fragrances, including Santal Vanille, Forbidden Fig and Baltic Amber. Seasonal scents Spiced Pumpkin Latte and White Cypress add a special touch to the holiday season. (We won't spoil the surprise of the other seven fragrances!) Each 2.5-ounce vegan candle is hand-poured and can burn for approximately 25 hours, and the set comes with a wick trimmer, which will help the candles last longer.

Fly By Jing Winter in Sichuan Advent Calendar

CNET kitchen guru David Watsky calls Fly By Jing's Sichuan chili crisp the "condiment to obsess over." This popular Advent calendar includes 12 2-ounce jars of spicy, flavorful goodness, including some you've probably never tried.

Best candy Advent calendars

Sugarfina’s 24 Tastes of Christmas Candy Advent Calendar

For a little daily dose of sugar, this Advent calendar will satisfy your sweet tooth. Each drawer contains a few pieces of delicious candy from the renowned Sugarfina brand, including Peppermint Bark Cookies, Red Apple Gummies, Holiday Hearts and Sparkling Stars.

Williams Sonoma Peppermint Bark Advent Calendar

If you haven't tried Williams Sonoma's peppermint bark, let us just warn you that it's highly, highly addictive. Luckily, with this festive Advent calendar, you can savor a sweet treat each day instead of gobbling a whole box down (which has been known to happen). You'll get 24 mini treats in various shapes, like trees, Santas, toy soldiers and snowmen -- all made from the most delectable peppermint bark on the planet.

See's Candies 2024 Advent Calendar

When it comes to chocolate and other sugary confections, See's is a classic. Any chocolate lover will love this Advent calendar, which has 24 pull-out drawers, each featuring a premium See's candy, such as a truffle or Lollypop -- plus, a never-before-seen treat. It comes as no surprise that its Advent calendar is quick to sell out each year. Luckily, you can preorder it, with orders available to ship as early as Oct. 18.

Dylan's Candy Bar Oh Christmas Tree

New York's Dylan's Candy Bar has a 2024 Advent calendar that's surprisingly budget-friendly. For just $10, you get a daily sweet treat from the iconic candy purveyor, including gummies, candy canes and a Snowman lollypop.

Best food and beverage Advent calendars

Harry & David Limited Edition 24 Days of Treats Advent Calendar

From chocolate peppermint truffles to vanilla shortbread cookies, this Advent calendar is filled with 24 drawers of delectable treats. Not only does the wooden Advent calendar make a nice keepsake once the holiday season ends, but it also lights up (batteries not included), with Saint Nick and his reindeer flying through a moonlit sky.

Personalized Coffee Pod Advent Christmas Tree

This coffee pod Advent calendar will not only satisfy any coffee fiend's daily caffeine fix, but also makes for a nice and unique gift, as the star on top can come engraved. For 40 characters or less, you can personalize the tree and have it say something like "Kim's Christmas Countdown." The tree is handmade from natural birch wood, is about 23" tall and will spruce up any kitchen or work break room.

Hickory Farms’ 12 Days of Charcuterie Advent Calendar

Calling all charcuterie fans: This Advent calendar is tantalizing for the taste buds. It includes flavorsome products like Sweet & Smoky Turkey Summer Sausage, Jalapeño Cheddar Blend and Strawberry Fig Jam -- as well as some chocolate surprises, too.

Walker’s 2024 Advent Calendar with Shortbread Cookies

Shortbread cookies are a fun variation on the typical chocolate Advent calendar -- and this one would pair well with a tea Advent calendar, but is also delicious on its own. It has six varieties of cookies, from stars and hearts to salted caramel squares and Walker's well-known shortbread fingers.

24 Days of Tea Advent Calendar

Start your day off right with a different tea each morning. Palais des Thés' tea Advent calendar includes 24 different gourmet tea bags filled with all sorts of delectable varieties, including black teas, green teas, herbal teas and Rooibos. It's a fantastic gift for the tea lover in your life and can also help take some of the stress out of the holidays.

Williams Sonoma Christmas Popcorn Advent Calendar

What better way to count down the days than to watch your favorite holiday movies with a bowl of popcorn each night? Pop open the doors -- no pun intended -- and discover a variety of premium popping corn and seasonings, including zesty cheddar, sweet caramel, dill pickle and other fun flavors. This is the perfect Advent calendar for someone who loves to indulge but doesn't want candy, because who doesn't love snacks?

Man Crates Beef Jerky Advent Calendar

We all know someone who can't get enough beef jerky and this Advent calendar will make all their carnivorous dreams come true. Over the course of 25 days, they'll get to try flavors like Sesame Ginger, Orange Habanero and even Rootbeer.

Best boozy Advent calendars

Nipyata Boozy Advent Calendar: 12 Shots of Christmas

If you can't decide what kind of alcohol-based Advent calendar to get someone -- or yourself -- you can get this variety pack, which contains 12 50mL favorites like Kahlua Coffee Liqueur, Baileys Irish Cream and Johnie Walker Black. We'll toast to that!

Wine Advent Calendar

In Good Taste's popular wine Advent calendars sell out quickly each year, and they're back for the 2024 holiday season. This Red, White & Rosé Advent calendar comes with 24 mini bottles, each holding 187mL of premium wine -- including Sauvignon Blanc, a fruity Grenache and a Shiraz -- from wine regions like California, Argentina, Italy -- and more. This calendar makes a festive hostess or office party gift for a wine lover, but we think it's also great to savor solo.

Woodford Reserve 8 Day Cocktail Advent Calendar

Bourbon lovers -- or anyone in your home who enjoys a good cocktail -- will appreciate this 8 Days of Spirit calendar from Kentucky distiller Woodford Reserve. While it doesn't come with bottles of bourbon per se, you'll get a bevy of bitters and mixers to make a satisfying cocktail each evening.

12 Days of IPAs Advent Calendar 2024

If there's an IPA lover in your life, this Advent calendar won't disappoint. Add some cheer to the holidays with this tasty selection from highly-rated U.S. craft breweries to help you count down the days to Christmas. Preorder it now for delivery in November.

Best beauty Advent calendars

Lush Advent Calendar

If you or someone you know is into bath bombs and shower gels, this Lush Advent calendar is full of them -- as well as other fun self-care-type items, like Yog Nog Body Lotion, Magic of Christmas Perfume and a calming Hot Toddy Scented Candle. And another perk? You can reuse the artsy box once you open all the Advent surprises inside.

L’Occitane 24-Piece Classic Advent Calendar

If you've ever wanted to try various luxury L'Occitane products, this Advent calendar is perfect for doing so. It features travel-sized samples, like Shea Butter Hand Cream and Verbena Shower Gel. (There is also a Premium Advent Calendar, which includes some full-sized products for $140.)

Benefit Cosmetics 'The Gorgeous Grocer' Beauty Advent Calendar

Sparkle at all your holiday parties with this kit full of beauty products that are sure to keep you feeling ultra-glamorous. You'll get 24 days of surprises, from volumizing mascara and foaming cleanser to various shades of blush and lip tints. And the best news is each beauty surprise will last far past Advent.

Olive & June 25 Days of Mani Magic

If you want to pamper yourself or a loved one this holiday season, Olive & June is the ultimate at-home mani experience. This year's "25 Days of Mani Magic" features six mini polishes in festive colors -- like Blitzen and Tangled Lights -- as well as mani must-haves, like nail files, a nail art pen and nail art stickers, among manicure accessories. In addition to the 25 Days calendar, Olive & June also sells a Hanukkah calendar ($55).

Best Advent calendars for kids

Lego Star Wars Advent Calendar 2024

This is fun for all ages. Every year, I get the latest edition for friends' kids and it's always a hit -- and their parents love putting the creations together just as much. The Advent calendar includes six miniature Star Wars figures -- like holiday versions of Princess Leia and Luke Skywalker -- as well as 18 buildable toys, including favorites like the Millennium Falcon, Yoda's Jedi Starfighter and Darth Vader's Castle.

Elf Advent Calendar

Anyone who loves the movie Elf (and who doesn't?) will be totally enamored with this Advent calendar from Williams Sonoma. It comes with a Mr. Narwhal sugar cookie, cocoa mix, a chocolate penguin and snowman and the kicker: maple syrup.

Mattel Barbie Advent Calendar

Barbie is still a fan favorite among kids and adults alike. This Advent calendar is like playing dress-up -- it comes with a Barbie doll and 24 accessories. Each day, a new one is revealed for her to wear, whether it's a jacket, purse, pair of high heels, you name it.

Light-Up Wooden Train Advent Calendar

A lot of kids love trains, and this Advent train calendar, the Anthro Express, is sure to be a hit among them. Although the train car doors open, you will have to fill them with your child's favorite things. The twinkling LED lights add a magical holiday feel, too.

Build-a-Bear Merry Mission Advent Calendar

This Build-a-Bear Advent calendar is inspired by the "Glisten and the Merry Mission" movie and includes 25 windows to open. Inside, you'll find a total of six mini stuffed animals, as well as 19 various clothing and accessory items to dress them up. And unlike a candy Advent calendar, the fun surprises will last long after Christmas.

Harry Potter Lego Advent Calendar

Harry Potter movies and Legos are fun for all ages, and this Advent calendar is a perfect combination of both. Each year, Lego creates a new buildable Hogwarts adventure. This year's kit includes seven Harry Potter characters -- favorites like Harry himself and Professor Flitwick -- as well as festive accessories, like a Christmas tree with a mini Hogwarts Express Train.

Funko Pop Disney Advent Calendar

Anyone who's a firm believer that Disneyland is the happiest place on Earth will appreciate this Disney Advent calendar from Funko. The collectible brand has created 24 vinyl figurines of all your favorite Disney characters -- but with a holiday twist. It's a lot of fun finding out which character you'll get each day, and you can use them as holiday decorations around your home, too.

Play-Doh Advent Calendar

This is a creative DIY Play-Doh kit. Each day, a new mini can of Play-Doh is revealed, along with an accessory, like a star or Christmas tree cutout. Great for ages 3 and older.
